text: The FBI interviewed all persons of interest on these flights prior to their departures . They concluded that none of the passengers was connected to the 9/11 attacks and have since found no evidence to change that conclusion . Our own independent review of the Saudi nationals involved confirms that no one with known links to terrorism departed on these flights .
